description: A green economy is one that is low carbon, resource efficient and sustainable. This module focuses on the role of energy in green economy transition. Fundamentals of the energy system and its expected transformation, deep decarbonisation and net zero emissions, together with the commonly adopted or proposed strategies to achieve these transformations, are studied. The analytical tools and skill sets used are those in the systems engineering and management domain, including systems thinking and design, scenario analysis, systems modelling and techno-economic analysis. Relevant cases on the latest developments in energy and/or green economy are developed and presented.
title: Energy and Green Economy
